title: PraXio™ Integrations
subtitle: Connect PraXio™ with your existing tools and systems. Seamless data flow, automated sync, and unified governance—all in one platform.
whyDescription: PraXio™ integrates with 20+ popular business tools to give you a unified view of your operations. No more switching between platforms or manual data entry.

benefit1.title: Real-Time Sync
benefit1.description: Data updates automatically every 5-60 seconds depending on importance.

benefit2.title: No Manual Entry
benefit2.description: Eliminate duplicate data entry and reduce errors by 90%.

benefit3.title: Unified Dashboard
benefit3.description: See all your metrics in one place—finance, HR, operations, sales.

integration1.name: HRMS Systems
integration1.description: Connect with BambooHR, Guidepoint, and other HR management systems for real-time team data.

integration2.name: Finance & Accounting
integration2.description: Integrate with QuickBooks, Xero, Chargebee, and other financial platforms for automated reporting.

integration3.name: CRM Platforms
integration3.description: Sync with HubSpot, Salesforce, Zoho CRM to track sales pipeline and customer metrics.

integration4.name: Project Management
integration4.description: Connect Jira, Asana, Monday.com to track project progress and team productivity.

integration5.name: Communication Tools
integration5.description: Integrate Slack, Microsoft Teams for automated notifications and alerts.

integration6.name: Data Sources
integration6.description: Import from Google Sheets, Microsoft Excel, and CSV files for custom data analysis.

customDescription: Don't see your tool listed? We can build custom integrations for your specific needs. Contact us to discuss your requirements.
readyDescription: See how PraXio™ integrates with your existing systems in a live demo.
